{{Lang|'''Daipai'''|zh=戴派|zh_rm=Dàipài}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in {{Quest|Across the Sea}}.

During the first part, {{Quest|Across the Sea|showType=0}}, he was sent to patrol the area around [[Minlin]] while the Millelith investigate an active unattended [[Ruin Guard]].

===Appearance===
Daipai is a man with fair skin, brown eyes, and black hair. He wears the standard Milelith uniform, and like other Millelith members, he is seen with a polearm.
